item.title: Latest Builds
item.description: Here are the latest builds for various platforms. v1.5.19 (2022.08.19) Release Notes # Windows (64-bit) Windows (32-bit) MacOS (Universal) Windows Portable (64-bit) Windows Portable (32-bit) Linux Ubuntu 18.04 Bionic (64-bit) Linux Ubuntu 20.04 Focal (64-bit) Linux Ubuntu 22.04 Jammy (64-bit) Linux Fedora 36 (64-bit) Linux SUSE Tumbleweed (64-bit) For previous releases click here. For the latest development/Beta builds click here. Looking for the Android Build? # This can be found via the dedicated MMEX Android site.

item.title: Development
item.description: Beta/Development Builds # Use unstable builds for early testing before official release. Avoid everyday use unless you need a specific feature/fix or are willing to risk using the latest software Windows # Access latest Appveyor development build Under “Job name,” choose x64 or Win32 > Artifacts > Portable (version recommended for unstable builds). MacOS # Repository of latest signed MacOS Universal builds Linux # Arch User Repo Stable Arch User Repo Development Install Linux - other installation instructions Build Linux from Source
